ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine stops outside, his breath coming in short bursts. He laid down in the shade of a nearby tree. The breeze was warm, but it still felt good blowing

Lunarpine stops outside, his breath coming in short bursts. He laid 
down in the shade of a nearby tree. The breeze was warm, but it still 
felt good blowing through his fur. the wind became stronger, he 
caught a scent in the air. An odd smell, but still a recognizable 
smell. A combination of Mech fluid and exaust. something about it 
didn't smell right. He knew they weren't alone.

Quickly he stood up, looking in the direction of the scent, he saw 
little movement, which only meant they didn't want to be discovered. 

Lunarpine turned and sprinted into the Ark calling out over his 
internal comm unit, " Lunarpine to Prowl,, we have company......"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Prowl/Striker/Ramulus::
> 
> Prowl nods slowly, letting what Bluestreak had said sink in. He 
blinks.
> 
> "Yes.... A military strategist. That's what I am," he grins, "But I 
had no 
> idea it ran through lives."
> 
> He blinks remembering something. "Nice to see you again, brother!"
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Striker runs into the charred clearing that the Ark was in, 
transforming into 
> robot mode.
> 
> "All Maximals," he says over his comm-link, "We've got a new base! 
Pack up 
> and move out."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Ramulus nods as he picks up Striker's transmission, walking into 
the bridge. 
> He walks over to a functional console.
> 
> "Computer," he says, "I need a total backup of all of the Ark's 
recording 
> chips and programming."
> 
> The computer beeps, getting to work on the project. Several moments 
later, a 
> disk emerges, which Ramulus picks up and puts in a storage 
compartment.
> 
> Ramulus turns, walking off toward his quarters to pick up a few 
things.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Prowl almost jumps at Striker's transmission.
> 
> "A new base!" he says, excitement clearly audible in his 
voice, "Let's get 
> packed! We can repair this dump later," he says to Bluestreak, 
walking off 
> into the Ark.
